alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 2:00AM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, possibly heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 7500 feet. * WHERE...Kaibab Plateau above 7500 feet, including the North Rim and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
